metadata.name: Potential Suspicious PowerShell Keywords
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious keywords that could indicate the use of a PowerShell exploitation framework

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.reflection.assembly.load($')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[system.reflection.assembly]::load($')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[reflection.assembly]::load($')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.reflection.assemblyname')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('reflection.emit.assemblybuilderaccess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('reflection.emit.customattributebuilder')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('runtime.interopservices.unmanagedtype')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('suspendthread')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rundll32'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious keywords that could indicate the use of a PowerShell exploitation framework
